Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.github.dandelion.datatables.extras.spring3.ajax.DatatablesCriteriasResolver
    in favor of the DatatablesCriteriasMethodArgumentResolver for versions of Spring 3.1 and greater.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.github.dandelion.datatables.core.ajax.DatatablesCriterias.getSortingColumnDefs()
    Use DatatablesCriterias.getSortedColumnDefs() instead.
    com.github.dandelion.datatables.core.ajax.DatatablesCriterias.hasOneFilterableColumn()
    Use DatatablesCriterias.hasOneSearchableColumn() instead.
    com.github.dandelion.datatables.core.ajax.ColumnDef.isFilterable()
    Use ColumnDef.isSearchable() instead.
    org.thymeleaf.standard.expression.StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseAssignationSequence(Arguments, String, boolean)
    since 2.1.0. Deprecated in favour of StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseAssignationSequence(org.thymeleaf.Configuration, org.thymeleaf.context.IProcessingContext, String, boolean) . Will be removed in 3.0.
    org.thymeleaf.standard.expression.StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseEach(Arguments, String)
    since 2.1.0. Deprecated in favour of StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseEach(org.thymeleaf.Configuration, org.thymeleaf.context.IProcessingContext, String) . Will be removed in 3.0.
    org.thymeleaf.standard.expression.StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseExpression(Arguments, String)
    since 2.1.0. Deprecated in favour of StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseExpression(org.thymeleaf.Configuration, org.thymeleaf.context.IProcessingContext, String) . Will be removed in 3.0.
    org.thymeleaf.standard.expression.StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseExpressionSequence(Arguments, String)
    since 2.1.0. Deprecated in favour of StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseExpressionSequence(org.thymeleaf.Configuration, org.thymeleaf.context.IProcessingContext, String) . Will be removed in 3.0.
    org.thymeleaf.standard.expression.StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseFragmentSelection(Arguments, String)
    since 2.1.0. Deprecated in favour of StandardExpressionParserWrapper.parseFragmentSelection(org.thymeleaf.Configuration, org.thymeleaf.context.IProcessingContext, String) . Will be removed in 3.0.
